thread.title: Rachel Weisz was asked to leave school because she had authority issues - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Rachel Weisz was asked to leave school because she had authority issues - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Rachel Weisz was asked to leave school because she had authority issues - Showbiz
text: Rachel Weisz was expelled from school when she was younger.The actress revealed that she had issues with authority back then, and added that she was a "disruptive" student. © PA Images "My mother always says, 'You weren't expelled. You were asked to leave'," she said on The Graham Norton Show, airing tonight (October 16)."I was very naughty. There wasn't one big event, but I had an authority issue and I didn't believe anyone had the right to tell me what to do."I was just very, very disruptive... [but] I don't mind a bit of authority now!" © Getty Images / Grant Lamos IV/FilmMagic Weisz also explained that her son has no interest in her career."He is completely, delightfully uninterested in seeing any of my films," she commented. "He is old enough now - at 9 - to see The Mummy, but he's just not interested."The Graham Norton Show airs tonight at 10.35pm on BBC One.
